comment: As if the Duchess of Cambridge was going to mother markle!! She is having a baby and others to look after. markle is a big girl, she can look after herself
amr:
# ::snt As if the Duchess of Cambridge was going to mother markle!! She is having a baby and others to look after. markle is a big girl, she can look after herself
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / resemble-01
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Markle")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Duchess"
                                    :op2 "of"
                                    :op3 "Cambridge"))
                        :ARG2 (m2 / mother))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h2 / have-05
                  :ARG0 (s / she)
                  :ARG1 (b / baby))
            :op2 (l / look-after-07
                  :ARG0 s
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :mod (o / other))))
      :snt3 (g / girl
            :mod (b2 / big)
            :domain (p4 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Markle")))
      :snt4 (p5 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (l2 / look-after-07
                  :ARG0 (s2 / she)
                  :ARG1 s2)))

comment: I wish people would stop referring to Cate's surname as 'Middleton' still. Her official title now she is married is Catherine Mountbatten-Windsor, Duchess of Cambridge and her name is spelt with a C not a K! Anyone with access to google would be able to find this, like I have.
amr:
# ::snt I wish people would stop referring to Cate's surname as 'Middleton' still. Her official title now she is married is Catherine Mountbatten-Windsor, Duchess of Cambridge and her name is spelt with a C not a K! Anyone with access to google would be able to find this, like I have.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / wish-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / stop-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person)
                  :ARG1 (r / refer-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person)
                        :ARG1 (n / name
                              :poss (p3 / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Cate")))
                        :ARG2 (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Middleton")
                        :mod (s2 / still))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (t / title-01
                  :ARG1 p3
                  :ARG2 (p4 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Catherine"
                              :op2 "Mountbatten-Windsor")
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c / city
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Cambridge"))
                              :ARG2 (d / duchess)))
                  :mod (o / official)
                  :time (n6 / now))
            :op2 (s3 / spell-01
                  :ARG1 (n7 / name
                        :poss p3)
                  :ARG2 (s4 / string-entity
                        :value "C"
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / contrast-01
                              :ARG2 (s5 / string-entity
                                    :value "K"))))
            :snt3 (p5 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (f / find-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / anyone
                              :ARG0-of (a3 / access-01
                                    :ARG1 (g / google-01)))
                        :ARG1 (t2 / this))
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (f2 / find-01
                              :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                              :ARG1 t2)))))
